Story Narator: This story is about the Small stone monster named 'shani' and the planet it lived is called 'zolania'.
In the planet 'zolania' all the stone monsters was living a very peaceful life with their family and the hero stone monster Shani's family are four in member father,mother,younger sister and himself.
the shani was one of the important warrior or kshatriya
The shani was under the king called 'surya'. now let's start the story

Shani: I 'Shani' will be at your service

Surya The King: Today I have an important anouncement to make, I 'surya' the king of 9 planets have decided to create a new planet

Story Narator: the conversation between the minister and the king

Surya The King: according to the plan we will destroy the 'zolania' planet and get the  rare raw material of iron and nickel for creating the new planet

Story Narator: Shani have overheard the conversation between the king and minister and enter the room

Shani: King destroying the planet will be unfair to monster in 'zolania'

Surya The King: that why i am going to destroy the planet with the monster

Shani: why do you want to destroy 'zolania'

Surya The King: only 'Zolania' is having the rare material of Iron and Nickel and have both in solid and liquid form

Shani: Then i will surely protect  planet and the lifes in it.

Surya The King: With the size and power of yours are you challangeing me . okey then lets have a game I will say where the bomb is but it will expload in 5 minutes
the bomb is in center of planet and it has four layer ,let me see how you reach there.

Shani: I will surely save the planet

Surya The King: Good luck and bye since I won't be seeing you again

Story Narator: Shani leaves the room and on the way he hears the monsters speaking about the Holes in the planet

Monster's converstions: Hey did you see I saw few holes in our planet that is too deep and it looked like we can go to other side of the planet
yeah even I saw a big hole that day but now they closed the hole with some wooden material

Shani: Then they digged holes to keep the bomb in the center of the planet and now I need to find the correct hole to reach the bomb
Planet have layer they are crust, mantle,outer core and inner core so the bomb is in the inner core.okey now I get it
so the holes are covered with wooden material since there are many holes how to find the correct hole?

Story Narator: The basic rule of the planet is 'Right is wrong and wrong is right' so let save the planet 'zolania's
